c:complexType.name: StackedLineChart
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Stacked Line chart.

c:property.name: point
c:property.c:documentation: The point plot is the main plot of the stacked line chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "point" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: StackedLinePlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the stacked line plot.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type is necessarily stacked.

c:property.name: linesVisible
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type necessarily shows lines connecting visual elements.
